comment.body:
Provides the look and feel for a plain text editor in the Synth look and feel. In this implementation the default UI is extended to act as a simple view factory.

Warning: Serialized objects of this class will not be compatible with future Swing releases. The current serialization support is appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running the same version of Swing. As of 1.4, support for long term storage of all JavaBeansTM has been added to the java.beans package. Please see {@link java.beans.XMLEncoder}. @author Shannon Hickey @version 1.8 06/24/04
